title: Screech Leeches
description: The screech leeches start to dress like you, then they suck you dry, and they take over life! So good. So scary. A modern commentary on parenting.
altHero: woman in the woods being approached by red-haired woman with the face of a leech
alt1: woman with red glasses looking worried as she walks down a dark street
alt2: woman screaming as three leeches suck on her arm
alt3: close-up of her arm with the leeches who are wearing red glasses like her
alt4: back of red-haired woman closing in on the other woman
